languages.text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Быть может... быть может, силы варпа заранее знали о том, чему суждено произойти... до того, как на планете появился культ... до того, как в систему явились обе Зари..."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Быть может... быть может, силы варпа заранее знали о том, чему суждено произойти... до того, как на планете появился культ... до того, как в систему явились обе Зари..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the forces of the warp had known ahead of time what was destined to happen... before the cult infiltrated the planet... before both Auroras showed up in the system..."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the forces of the warp had known ahead of time what was destined to happen... before the cult infiltrated the planet... before both Auroras showed up in the system..."

{n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."

languages.text: {n}Idira menea la cabeza.{/n} «Tal vez... tal vez los poderes de la disformidad sabían de antemano lo que iba a pasar... antes de que el culto se infiltrara en el planeta... antes de que ninguna de las Auroras llegara al sistema...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira menea la cabeza.{/n} «Tal vez... tal vez las fuerzas de la disformidad sabían de antemano lo que iba a pasar... antes de que el culto se infiltrara en el planeta... antes de que ninguna de las Auroras llegara al sistema...».

languages.text: {n}Idira secoue la tête.{/n} « Peut-être... Peut-être que les forces du Warp savaient déjà ce qui devait arriver... avant que le culte s'infiltre sur la planète... avant même que les deux Aurore apparaissent dans le système... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira secoue la tête.{/n} « Peut-être... Peut-être que les forces du Warp savaient déjà ce qui devait arriver... avant que le culte s'infiltre sur la planète... avant même que les deux Aurore apparaissent dans le système... »

languages.text: {n}イディラは首を振る。{/n}「たぶん…たぶん、歪みの軍勢は事前に何が起きるか知ってたのよ…教団が星に侵入する前…オーロラが星系に現れる前から…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは首を振る。{/n}「たぶん…たぶん、歪みの軍勢は事前に何が起きるか知ってたのよ…教団が星に侵入する前…オーロラが星系に現れる前から…」

languages.text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Vielleicht ... vielleicht wussten die Kräfte des Warp schon im Voraus, was geschehen würde. Bevor der Kult den Planeten infiltriert hat ... Bevor eine Aurora im System auftauchte ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Vielleicht ... vielleicht wussten die Kräfte des Warp schon im Voraus, was geschehen würde ... bevor der Kult den Planeten infiltriert hat ... bevor eine Aurora im System auftauchte ..."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“或许是……或许是亚空间的力量早就看到了注定会发生的事情……早在邪教渗透到那颗行星之前……甚至早在‘极光’还没有来到这个星系之前……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“或许是……或许是亚空间的力量早就意识到了注定会发生的事情……早在邪教渗透到那颗行星之前……甚至早在‘极光’还没有来到这个星系之前……”

languages.text: {n}İdira başını sallıyor.{/n} "Belki de öteboyut güçleri, yaşanacak olanı önceden biliyordu. Tarikat, gezegene sızmadan önce... Auroralar sisteme girmeden önce..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps the powers of the warp knew ahead of time what was destined to happen. Before the cult infiltrated the planet... Before either Aurora showed up in the system..."
